summary: Frontend testing of UI/content updates completed successfully. All requested changes verified: About page has updated Mission, Vision, and Our Story content. Footer Legal & Compliance heading font size matches Product heading (both 18px). Partners page rewritten for pre-seed aspirational positioning with no fictional partner companies listed as actual partners.
passed_tests: About page - Mission section shows: 'To empower employees and employers with a safe, transparent platform that provides early access to earned wages — reducing financial anxiety while strengthening workplace trust and productivity.'
About page - Vision section shows: 'To be Africa's most trusted workplace finance partner — fostering financial wellness through innovation, transparency, and secure technology.'
About page - Our Story section shows: 'EaziWage was born from a simple truth: thousands of workers across Kenya and Africa face a financial gap before payday...'
About page - Our Story second paragraph shows: 'We built EaziWage to break that cycle...'
Footer - Legal & Compliance heading has same font size (18px) as Product heading
Footer - Legal & Compliance heading has same font weight (600) as Product heading
Partners page - 'Pre-Seed Stage' badge displayed prominently
Partners page - Stats show: Target Workers (50K+), Market Potential ($2B+), Target Countries (4), Launch Year (2026)
Partners page - 'Building the Partner Ecosystem' section present with target partner types
Partners page - Target partner types displayed: Mobile Money Providers, Banking Institutions, Payroll Platforms, Enterprise Employers
Partners page - No fictional company names (Safaricom, KCB Bank, Equity Bank, Twiga Foods, Jumia, Glovo, Bolt) as actual partners
Partners page - MTN MoMo mentioned only as example of mobile money provider category (acceptable)
Footer links scroll to top when clicked (verified scroll from 3285px to 0px)
Footer navigation works correctly with scroll-to-top behavior

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI/content update features working correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/content updates batch 6 completed: About page has updated Mission ('To empower employees and employers...'), Vision ('To be Africa's most trusted workplace finance partner...'), and Our Story ('EaziWage was born from a simple truth...') content. Footer Legal & Compliance heading matches Product heading (18px, font-weight 600). Partners page rewritten with pre-seed aspirational positioning - shows 'Pre-Seed Stage' badge, 'Building the Partner Ecosystem' section with target partner types (Mobile Money Providers, Banking Institutions, Payroll Platforms, Enterprise Employers). No fictional partner company logos. MTN MoMo only appears as an example of mobile money provider category.

about_page.mission_content: To empower employees and employers with a safe, transparent platform...
about_page.vision_content: To be Africa's most trusted workplace finance partner...
about_page.our_story_content: EaziWage was born from a simple truth...

partners_page.mtn_context: Only as example of mobile money provider category (MTN MoMo), not as actual partner
